description: The Wintergreen Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Wintergreen Resort for the snow report
Alexa, ask Wintergreen Resort for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Wintergreen Resort
shortDescription: The Wintergreen Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Wintergreen Resort.
